charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Elio
and Leon having a conversation.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0200_10:
Alola! I was just chatting with Leon about
our partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0300_10: Yeah! This is my partner, Calyrex...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0400_10:
And it’s riding atop another Pokémon called
Glastrier!
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0500_10:
Their bond is what helps bring them together
as one Pokémon, apparently.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0600_10: And my partner Pokémon is Necrozma!
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0700_10:
It’s in Dusk Mane form, which means it
has attached itself to Solgaleo.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0800_10:
It seems that doing so allows it to dominate
Solgaleo’s mind and body.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_0900_10:
In both cases, two different Pokémon come
together to become one...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1000_10:
But I don’t think it’s exactly the same kind of
mutually supportive relationship that Calyrex
and Glastrier have.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1100_10:
I also heard that Necrozma devours
Solgaleo’s light and power...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1200_10: and that worried me a little.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1300_10:
But those two separate from
each other sometimes, right?
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1400_10:
Yup. They can, as long as they’re not
in a battle...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1500_10:
If they can fuse and separate at will, then
it’s not completely one-sided, is it?
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1700_10:
Now that you mention it, they don’t seem
to be suffering or anything when they
separate from each other...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_1900_10:
but they eventually realized they could turn
their relationship into something more
cooperative!
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_2100_10:
During my island challenge, I ran into
all kinds of folks...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_2200_10:
Sometimes we couldn’t understand
each other and clashed...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_2300_10:
but I think those moments still helped me
learn and grow.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_2400_10:
Necrozma and Solgaleo probably overcame
some trials of their own.
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_2900_10:
And maybe moving forward, experiencing
all sorts of things together will deepen their
bond even more!
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_3000_10:
All right! Could you and Leon have a battle
with me?
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_3100_10: Sure! Calyrex and I will take you on!
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_3200_10:
Necrozma! Just like how you and Solgaleo
got to know each other better...
charaepi_ch0122_90_yo/2301_1201_3300_10:
I’ll do my very best to understand you more
through this battle, too!
